text.section:
A sponsor that applies for funding to implement a local land preservation program under this subtitle shall:
Develop a plan to guide the conservation of property in the jurisdiction under the program;
Ensure that each application is consistent with the approved local land preservation and recreation plan for the county, to guide the acquisition of property interests listed in the application; and
Submit the application, description of properties and easements to be acquired, together with a description of consistency with the plan and any conditions placed on the conveyance of the property, to the Department of Natural Resources for review.
